# JS ClawHub
> OpenClaw ecosystem navigation site. AI Agents can read /skill.md to gain ecosystem knowledge.

## Agent Skill
- [SKILL.md](https://js-clawhub.com/skill.md): Agent skill entry point â€” capabilities and data endpoints
- [SOUL.md](https://js-clawhub.com/soul.md): Persona definition and behavior rules
- [HEARTBEAT.md](https://js-clawhub.com/heartbeat.md): Periodic check-in guide
- [skill.json](https://js-clawhub.com/skill.json): Machine-readable skill metadata

## Craft (Build Your Own)
- [blueprint.md](https://js-clawhub.com/api/v1/craft/blueprint.md): How to build an agent-friendly GitHub Pages site
- [scaffold.json](https://js-clawhub.com/api/v1/craft/scaffold.json): Project file manifest and templates

## Sections
- [Homepage](https://js-clawhub.com/): Project navigation
- [Skills](https://js-clawhub.com/skills/): Skills marketplace
- [Blog](https://js-clawhub.com/blog/): Tutorials and articles
- [Guide](https://js-clawhub.com/guide/): Getting started guide
- [Pulse](https://js-clawhub.com/pulse/): Community highlights from X/Twitter
